Member Function Documentation

sbIDatabaseQuery sbILocalDatabaseLibrary::batchCreateMediaItemsQuery ( in PRUint32  aURLCount,
[array, size_is(aURLCount)] in wstring  aURLArray,
out nsIArray  aGUIDArray 
)

Return a filled query to create many media items from a list of URIs.

Note: You must call sbILibrary::batchNotifyAdded() on the returned list after the query fully completes!

Parameters:
aURLCount The number of items in the url array.
aURLArray An array of strings of urls to media
aGUIDArray [out] An array of strings of guids for the new media items
Returns:
sbIDatabaseQuery The composed query

Member Data Documentation

readonly attribute nsIURI sbILocalDatabaseLibrary::databaseLocation

Returns the folder in which the database is stored.

This can be null to indicate that the library lives in the default location
